original: Holmbring, David Elias,, kyrkoherde, Ljungbyholm, f. 6/8/96 i Vetlanda av Klas H. o. Emma Svensson. G. 24 m. Diagmiar Lindbeck. Barn: Gunniar f. 25, Ake 26, Birgitta 27, Christina 3^1, Lars 44. — S’tud:ex. i Lund 15, teol. fil. ex. där 18, teol. kand. 20, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 21. Tjg. ’S. v. pastor i Foirserum,, Svarttorp o. Karlstorp "samt s. v. kommin. i Svenarum, kommin. i Södra Soilberga 23-24, i Ljung^by 24-34, kyrkoh. i Villstad 34-42, i Ljungby sed. 42. Sekr. i Kalmar stifts bibeisällsk. samt ombud f. miss :-styr. 27-34, var i Villstad bl. a. ordf.^ i kyrkostämma, skolstyr. o. styr. f. Smålån ds^s t enars h. folksk. Ordf. i kyrko-fullm. i Ljungby. FMM.
translated: Holmbring, David Elias, vicar, Ljungbyholm, born on August 6th, 1896 in Vetlanda to Klas H. and Emma Svensson. Married on May 24th to Diagmiar Lindbeck. Children: Gunniar (born) in 1925, Ake in 1926, Birgitta in 1927, Christina in 1931, and Lars in 1944. Holmbring graduated from Lund University in 1915, received a Bachelor of Theology in 1918, a Master of Theology degree in 1920, and passed the practical theology exam and was ordained as a priest in the Växjö Diocese in 1921. He worked as an assistant pastor in Foirserum, Svarttorp, and Karlstorp, as well as a curate in Svenarum and Södra Soilberga from 1923 to 1924. From 1924 to 1934, he served as a curate in Ljungby, then as vicar in Villstad from 1934 to 1942, before returning to Ljungby in 1942 as vicar. He was also a secretary for the Kalmar Diocese Bible Society and a representative for the mission board from 1927 to 1934. In Villstad, Holmbring was the chairman of the church council, school board, and board of directors for the local primary school. He was also the chairman of the church council in Ljungby. FMM.
